ingredients.item: 8 No.1 Free Range Corn Fed Chicken Drum Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Trim the swede, then halve. Thinly slice each half into 3-5mm thick pieces, and place on a large, nonstick baking tray.

Add the chicken, oil, herbs and garlic. Season and roast for 20 minutes. Toss everything well then add the chickpeas and honey and continue roasting for 10-20 minutes, or until the meat is thoroughly cooked, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat.
Serve immediately, drizzled with any pan juices, and a handful of lamb’s lettuce on the side.
